This is to prevent hackers from guessing Company passwords by entering random characters continuously. The locked-out account cannot be used until it is reset by the Support Team or until the 15 minutes of lockout duration for the account have expired. To mitigate the risk of fast unlocking, special message is sent to employee to verify wrong password usage or update the password on all devices trying to
